caption: Table 2: SB-GFlowNet significantly accelerates the training of GFlowNets in a streaming setting. Indeed, SB-GFlowNets achieve an accuracy comparable to a GFlowNet trained from scratch to sample from π2(·|D1:2) in less than half the time (measured in seconds per 20k epochs).
description: This table compares the training time and accuracy of SB-GFlowNets versus standard GFlowNets for phylogenetic inference with different numbers of leaves in the phylogenetic tree.  SB-GFlowNets show a significant reduction in training time while maintaining comparable accuracy.
